description: Observations to Adjoining Borough, City of London for full demolition of 45 - 47 Little Britain and 20, 25, 48 - 50, 51 - 53, 60 62 Bartholomew Close, part demolition of 39 - 41, 34 - 38, 57b Little Britain and 61, 61a Bartholomew Close and demolition of the rear of 47 and 59 Bartholomew Close. Development of new buildings (some behind retained facades) of varying heights (ground plus two storeys to ground plus twelve storeys with accommodation at lower ground and basement level, including alterations to existing basements) and alteration of retained facades to provide 216 residential units (Class C3), office use 32,042sq.m (Class B1), retail use 574sq.m (Class A1) and flexible retail use 1,878sq.m (Class A1 to A4) with ancillary gym facilities (for resident use), car parking, servicing and plant. Creation of roof terraces, balconies, new areas of open space and upgrading of existing open space. Alterations to the pedestrian routes and public highway along with associated works to facilitate the development.
